* Reports:
** First of all we would like to thank our sponsor <nowiki>[[http://altfa.com.my/v2/contact-us.html|Altfa Solutions Training Center]]</nowiki> for providing us nice and fully equipped facilities for our jam to be carried out successfully.  
** Jam start at 10.00^am^ with an opening speech from <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~pislissniflis|Tajul]]</nowiki>, Altfa Solutions Training Center representative <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/mohd.sallehuddin|Mohd Sallehuddin]]</nowiki> and briefing about ubuntu and global jam by <nowiki>[[fenris|fenris]]</nowiki> 
** After Lunch we start to delegating groups for each theme to be carried out separately. Sadly, we dont have enough people to do Documentations and translations themes.
** There are 3 people involve in Upgrade Theme upgrading Oneiric Ocelot to Precise Beta 1. We use ubuntu.bytecraft.com.my as the mirror for the upgrading process. Ugrading are success without any major problems or bugs found. 
** For Packaging theme we have <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~wmfairuz-wanismail|Fairuz]]</nowiki> as the tutor via Gobby. <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~hotfloppy|hotfloppy]]</nowiki> being the sole person learning about packaging from <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~wmfairuz-wanismail|Fairuz]]</nowiki>. So for this time it is only learning instead of making any useful package for ubuntu. We really hope that if we are able to organize this jam again in the future we will be able to make some usefull package for ubuntu.
